name: DigTD
description:
Oh no! The insects grew to giant size and are attacking humanity!

Good that I always keep a rocket in my barn for situations just like this. Now I only need to collect enough rocket fuel to hide deep in outer space.

In DigTD you fight off hoards of insects by placing towers in your underground maze. Meanwhile you gather as much rocket fuel as you can for that sweet highscore (and to flee from earth eventually).

WebGL BUILD IS COMING WHEN IT'S WORKING! :-)
